title: VR-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Environment Design for Autistic Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematics concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Strengthening VR-based adaptive learning environment design capabilities for corporate administrators/leaders supporting autistic learners

learning_goals: Analyze cognitive load factors for autistic learners in VR environments and design minimization strategies
Create VR content for math concept learning using multimodal representation strategies
Implement a learner data-based adaptive feedback system integrated with an LMS (Learning Management System)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
